channel.title: Continuous Review (Update 2)
channel.description:
To be up to date on what's happening in Whonix development...
[ul][li]Hit the watch button on [url=https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/issues]github issues[/url] to follow github discussions.[/li] [li]Sign up for the [url=https://www.whonix.org/cgi-bin/mailman/listinfo/whonix-devel]developer mailing list[/url].[/li] [li]There are 5 different choices, push or pull notifications for [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/git#subscribe_to_code_changes]monitoring Whonix source code changes[/url].[/li] [li][u][b][url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Issue_Tracker]New Issue Tracker[/url][/b][/u][/li][/ul]
Check also out our [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Developer_Portal]Developer Portal[/url] page.
This post is locked. Please post a new topic to suggest changes.

item.title: Continuous Review (Update 2)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
To be up to date on what’s happening in Whonix development…

[ul][li]Hit the watch button on github issues to follow github discussions.[/li]
[li]Sign up for the developer mailing list.[/li]
[li]There are 5 different choices, push or pull notifications for monitoring Whonix source code changes.[/li]
[li]New Issue Tracker[/li][/ul]

Check also out our Developer Portal page.
